voxatrace/com.musicmuni.voxatrace.features/HpcpExtractor/createHandle

createHandle

actual fun createHandle(frameSize: Int, sampleRate: Int, hpcpSize: Int): Long?
expect fun createHandle(frameSize: Int, sampleRate: Int, hpcpSize: Int = 12): Long?

Create a native handle for standalone HPCP extraction.

Uses dedicated voxatrace_hpcp_* C API for efficient HPCP extraction without computing pitch. This avoids wastefully computing YIN pitch when pitch is already available from a detector.

Return

Native handle (Long), or null if creation fails

Parameters

frameSize

Frame size in samples (typically 2048 for FFT)

sampleRate

Sample rate in Hz (typically 16000)

hpcpSize

HPCP vector size (typically 12 for semitones)

actual fun createHandle(frameSize: Int, sampleRate: Int, hpcpSize: Int): Long?
